Naa Ashorkor (amụrụ 24 Nọvemba 1988) makwaara dị ka Nisirine Naa Ashorkor Mensah-Doku, bụ onye omere Ghana na onye mgbasa ozi onye na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a na Asaase Radio ụlọ ọrụ redio dị na Accra
A maara ya maka ịgbanye na "Foto zuru oke" (2009), nke Shirley Frimpong-Manso na Iroko TV's Poisoned Bait - ihe nkiri Leila Djansi duziri.

O ritere ihe nrite maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma na 2010 na African Movie Academy  ihe nrite maka ọrụ ya na "The Perfect Picture" (2009). Naa Ashorkor sonyekwara Yvonne Okoro, Joselyn Dumas, John Dumelo.
